column5: Was wondering if there was much interference from Antis on this site - postings - attacks etc. There must be but we never see them on here - the head dudes must be doing a great job monitoring!!  Has anyone had a run in with Antis in the field?  I did once in Huntsville - I was in my boat and they drove theirs within 2 feet of where I was and starting calling me names and all sort of stuff. Found out later that I should have reported them because it is illegal to interfere with a Hunter or Fisherman (Fisherwoman) while doing legal activity.  Be aware of your rights.  Bare

I might have taken them seriously if they paddled by in a canoe..but motor boat....  Like Gore preaching global warming awareness...yet his home uses 20x the average power consumption of homes in his state...
nothing like meeting them in the bush while you are hunting...may the find the peace in death, they couldn't find in life  only a rock marks their final resting place
Terry, get 'ole Pork Chop after them!
His house is also 20X bigger than the average house and he buys 'Green Power', which is electricity from renewable, non-polluting resources which costs him 4X the normal electricty rates.
Pretty sure the private jet uses cooking oil or some such twaddle. Joe
Could be Joe...them turbine's will run on most anything...
Some truths really are inconvenient. Ask Stephen Colbert.
